descriptions.seed_weights: Probability weights for each seed selection strategy
descriptions.episode_lookback_hours: No drift if no episodes within this window (168h = 7 days)
descriptions.episode_recency_decay: Exponential decay rate for recency weighting in seed selection (λ in exp(-λ*age_hours)). 0.02 = ~3.5% weight at 7 days vs today.
descriptions.concept_cooldown_minutes: Per-concept cooldown to prevent circular rumination
descriptions.jitter_range: Random multiplier range for check interval [min, max]
descriptions.fatigue_budget: Max cumulative activation score before fatigue (stronger drifts exhaust more)
descriptions.long_gap_probability: Chance of extended silence between drifts (realism)
descriptions.min_activation_energy: Minimum spreading activation score to produce a thought
descriptions.decaying_reinforce_bump: Strength bump for decaying concepts on successful drift only
descriptions.insight_sessions_cap: Minimum drift cycles between insight seed selections (throttle to avoid over-surfacing pattern observations)
descriptions.autonomous_actions.communicate: Config for proactive messaging action. enabled=false to disable outreach entirely.
descriptions.autonomous_actions.reflect: Config for internal reflection action. Enriches drift thoughts with associations, stores as reflection gists. type_repeat_decay penalizes consecutive same-type reflections.
descriptions.autonomous_actions.plan: Config for proactive plan creation. Creates plan-backed persistent tasks from recurring drift topics. Signal persistence gate prevents over-eager planning.
